publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1986.1 Phil Gallie: Action on International Debt—As an amendment to motion (S1M-1986) in the name of Des McNulty, leave out "Her Majesty's Government" and insert "Conservative Governments". Supported by: John Scott*, Miss Annabel Goldie*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, John Young*, Ben Wallace*, David Mundell*, Alex Fergusson*, Mr Brian Monteith*, David McLetchie*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Mr David Davidson*, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, Mary Scanlon*, Alex Johnstone*, Bill Aitken*, Mr Keith Harding*

S1M-1986.1 Phil Gallie: Action on International Debt—As an amendment to motion (S1M-1986) in the name of Des McNulty, leave out "Her Majesty's Government" and insert "Conservative Governments". Supported by: John Scott, Miss Annabel Goldie, Mr Jamie McGrigor, John Young, Ben Wallace, David Mundell, Alex Fergusson, Mr Brian Monteith, David McLetchie, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Mr David Davidson, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Mary Scanlon, Alex Johnstone, Bill Aitken, Mr Keith Harding

S1M-1986.1 Phil Gallie: Action on International Debt—As an amendment to motion (S1M-1986) in the name of Des McNulty, leave out "Her Majesty's Government" and insert "consecutive governments". Supported by: John Scott, Miss Annabel Goldie, Mr Jamie McGrigor, John Young, Ben Wallace, David Mundell, Alex Fergusson, Mr Brian Monteith, David McLetchie, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Mr David Davidson, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Mary Scanlon, Alex Johnstone, Bill Aitken, Mr Keith Harding

S1M-1986.1 Phil Gallie: Action on International Debt-As an amendment to motion (S1M-1986) in the name of Des McNulty, leave out "Her Majesty's Government" and insert "consecutive governments". Supported by: John Scott, Miss Annabel Goldie, Mr Jamie McGrigor, John Young, Ben Wallace, David Mundell, Alex Fergusson, Mr Brian Monteith, David McLetchie, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Mr David Davidson, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Mary Scanlon, Alex Johnstone, Bill Aitken, Mr Keith Harding
